name: A Murder in Time
description:
You, a once famous detective decide to catch a murderer on your own. 

Will you find the evidence of his crimes before he finds you? 

Controls;

WSAD: Movement.

Left Mouse Button: Interaction.

Right Mouse Button: closing the notes.

This game was made for a Gamejam. I made nearly all the models during the Jam. Only murderer and one furniture were uploaded from older project (but still made by me)

I wasn't able to fit whole story into this one week project, but I hope to finish the game someday, with better graphics, bigger location, and clever AI that would react to the player in realistic ways.
